comments:
20021023

I get an illegal argument exception with the following steps:

1) Open the PDE manifest editor on org.eclipse.pde .ui
2) Select org.eclipse.ui.decorators from the extensions
3) select Binary Plugin projects

You don't get this one very often - I can't currently replicate it.
